scripts.deploy: npm run zip && npm run upload
scripts.deploy-prod: npm run zip && npm run upload-prod
scripts.deploy-test: npm run zip && npm run upload-test
scripts.release: VERSION=`node -e "console.log(require('./package.json').version);"`;git tag -a $VERSION -m "Release  v${VERSION}"; git push origin $VERSION
scripts.publish-prod: npm run deploy-prod && aws lambda publish-version --profile prod --function-name 'GatewayAuthLambda'
scripts.publish-test: npm run deploy-test && aws lambda publish-version --profile test --function-name 'GatewayAuthLambda'
